summary: Email correspondence between a forensic accountant and PayPal's Law Enforcement Fulfillment Team regarding the processing of subpoenas for financial records related to the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. Ashley Betzhold from PayPal confirms fulfillment of a records request and offers to be the point of contact for future subpoenas.

persons.name: Ashley Betzhold
persons.role: Analyst, Global Law Enforcement Fulfillment at PayPal
persons.context: Ashley Betzhold works on PayPal's Law Enforcement Fulfillment Team and is the point of contact for subpoena requests related to the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. She confirms fulfillment of a records request and offers assistance with future subpoenas.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the subject of the investigation for which PayPal subpoenas are being processed. The email references a case with reference number 791064 related to him.

connections.description: Ashley Betzhold, as part of PayPal's Law Enforcement Fulfillment Team, is processing financial subpoenas and records related to the investigation of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: PayPal subpoena fulfillment for Epstein investigation
events.description: Ashley Betzhold from PayPal confirms fulfillment of a records request (case reference 791064) related to Jeffrey Epstein and offers to be the point of contact for future subpoenas in the investigation.

keyFacts: PayPal's Law Enforcement Fulfillment Team has processed subpoenas for financial records related to Jeffrey Epstein (case reference 791064).
Ashley Betzhold is the designated point of contact at PayPal for future subpoenas and questions regarding the Epstein investigation.
The correspondence indicates an active financial investigation into Jeffrey Epstein as of August 2019.
The email demonstrates cooperation between law enforcement and financial institutions in gathering evidence for the Epstein case.
